mapper.sql: id, providerNo, value, result,tciId, createDate, updateDate, creater, updater, plasmaId
mapper.select: SELECT dp.*,pb.name,pb.imagez, pb.sex, pb.type AS pbType, pb.bloodType,sc.sampleNo, pb.icNumber FROM f_detection_proteins AS dp INNER JOIN f_provider_baseinfo AS pb ON pb.providerNo = dp.providerNo INNER JOIN f_provider_registries AS sc ON sc.allId= dp.allId AND TO_DAYS(dp.updateDate) = TO_DAYS(#{startTime}) ORDER BY dp.result ASC

SELECT rpc.*, pb.name, pb.sex, pb.type AS pbType,sc.sampleNo, pb.imagez, pb.bloodType, pb.icNumber FROM f_detection_proteins AS rpc INNER JOIN f_provider_baseinfo AS pb ON rpc.providerNo = pb.providerNo INNER JOIN f_provider_registries AS sc ON sc.allId= rpc.allId WHERE rpc.id = #{id}

SELECT brp.*, pb.name,pb.sex, pr.sampleNo FROM f_detection_proteins AS brp INNER JOIN f_provider_baseinfo AS pb ON pb.providerNo = brp.providerNo INNER JOIN f_provider_registries AS pr ON pr.allId = brp.allId WHERE TO_DAYS(brp.updateDate) = TO_DAYS(#{chooseDate}) AND brp.result IS NOT NULL;
